item.title: Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback
item.description: Review: Reinforcement Learning Basics Reinforcement learning is a mathematical framework. Demystify the reinforcement learning model, it’s a open-ended model using reward function to optimize agent to solve complex task in target environment.

item.title: Train LLM from scratch
item.description: Find a dataset Find a corpus of text in language you prefer. Such as OSCAR Intuitively, the more data you can get to pretrain on, the better results you will get.
